experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Hyundai Mobis
workDescription: Worked on developing an Asset Management Tool that retrieves and dynamically displays real-time asset data, ensuring that any changes made (e.g., transfer ownership, update maintenance status) are immediately reflected on the frontend interface.
Developed a responsive and dynamic frontend using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, improving user experience by 25% and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Built a scalable backend with Spring Boot and Maven, enabling seamless integration of modules and reducing build times by 20% through optimized dependency management.
Enabled seamless interaction between the database and React-based frontend by building REST APIs using Spring Boot, ensuring data consistency with minimal latency.

Designed and implemented a relational database schema with MySQL/PostgreSQL, enabling efficient handling of over 10,000 asset records and ensuring high data integrity for ownership and transfer history.
Enhanced system security by integrating JWT-based authentication, ensuring token invalidation upon logout and safeguarding against unauthorized access.
Implemented two-factor authentication for high-security users, reducing unauthorized access risk by 50% and improving user trust.
Automated workflows for asset transfers and maintenance tracking, reducing manual intervention by 50% and streamlining operations.
Developed advanced search and filter capabilities using JavaScript and SQL queries, allowing users to retrieve asset details within seconds based on owner, maintenance status, or transfer history.
Monitored and optimized backend performance with Spring Actuator, achieving a 20% reduction in API latency and improving overall application responsiveness.
Used CSS frameworks to ensure consistency in styling across the frontend, enhancing brand alignment and usability.
Deployed the application using Docker for containerization, ensuring a reliable and scalable environment for production and development.

experiences.title: Android Developer
experiences.subtitle: Hyundai Mobis
workDescription: Developed and debugged Android safety and security telematics applications (ERSA, ACN, SOS calls, and voice recognition) for six vehicle models (Kia Carens, Kia EV, Kia Sonet, Hyundai Venue, Hyundai i20, etc.) IVI systems using Android and Java programming languages.
Implemented VoLTE network features in the native Android Telephony Framework and RIL middleware for Indian model cars using C++, enhancing network reliability considerably.

Conducted a detailed analysis of telematics applications, successfully identifying and addressing performance issues. This significantly improved system responsiveness for Hyundai and Kia car infotainment systems, involving extensive debugging.

Resolved critical Vodafone network connectivity issues in customer vehicles by collaborating directly with network providers, ensuring uninterrupted connectivity and notably enhancing customer satisfaction.
Automated log analysis application developed using React, JavaScript, and SQL, which reduced developer intervention time by 50% and improved the efficiency of the issue analysis process.

Designed and developed a React-based website that dynamically synced with the infotainment system, ensuring all updates and changes made to the system were accurately reflected on the website in real-time.

Created a shell script to automate GIT repository synchronization and Android build generation, doubling the efficiency of the build preparation process. This significantly improved workflow consistency and reduced the likelihood of errors, leading to more reliable builds.
Took responsibility for communicating and coordinating with various stakeholders during the development phase, leading to a 20% reduction in project completion time.

experiences.title: Fullstack Development Intern
experiences.subtitle: Virtusa
workDescription: Developed a part of loan moratorium application, Worked with Java, SpringBoot, REST API and MongoDB, partnered with a front end intern to complete the application.
